name: Creation In User Word Startup Folder
description: Detects the creation of an file in user Word Startup
query: (file.path:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp]\\.*/ AND (NOT (file.path:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Bb]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Dd][Ff]/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ww][Ll]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Word\\STARTUP\\* AND (NOT (file.path:(*.docx OR *.docm OR *.dotx OR *.dotm OR *.docb OR *.pdf OR *.wll OR *.wwl))))`
